title: Is Riot trolling with Nidalee?
body:
So essentially the ONLY reason Nidalee was reworked was because so much of her damage was front loaded onto her Spear. So basically the rework gutted her Q and buffed her cougar abilities, from this, arose top lane tri force ad nidalee, although it had been done before it was basically the only way to play her now as her spear was so weak. Realising that this was cancerous and broken they buffed her spear a ton and stripped her cougar back slightly, now what we have is AP spear spam nid once again, she is essentially identical what she was pre rework except now instead of needing to hit 2 spears to kill someone from 100 she only has to hit one then she can commando leap half way across a lean to finish them if they are 50% or less hp.

Am I the only one confused as to why her spears are almost doing identical damage now to what they did pre rework? her spears can 50% hp bars easily now and tanking one at max range means you're out of the fight. This was THE REASON SHE WAS REWORKED.

Personally if I was Riot I'd just delete nidalee as I don't value her existence and haven't since Season 2. Are people finding her AP spears are just as cancerous as ever? sure Dodging them is easy in lane, but it's over the wall spears in sieging that become a problem, they spend the majority of their travel time in terrain and have essentially no time to react, and if Nidalee throws enough spears shes going to hit someone eventually.

replies.body:
Her spears only half health at near max range.

Also cancel her spears over walls with WARDS.

lol alex ich is playing nid now, showcasing how shes nothing but a spear bot. she needs another rework, she can't exist in ap form as anything other then a spear bot as the rest of her kit isn't good enough to justify her viability, her spears will easily 60% hp an adc btw at max range if not more, http://www.twitch.tv/alexich

I play nidalee, she is more then a spear bot, sure she needs to hit one for a mark, but a good nidalee uses cougar form just as much as her human form.

EDIT: Not to mention she is fucked with where the meta is heading, Sejuani and co of tank junglers and full tank top laners coming back in means nidalee only has 2 targets she can hit with spears that does anything, and for both of them she can't actually dive them cause the tanks will screw her.

You are cancer on this game. Stop complaining about a champ and learn how to play against them, like i'm learning how to play against lissandra in mid lane.


If you ward and have vision, and can not be a retard and dodge nidalee's spears, she'll have a hard time killing you as she's pretty squishy.

Thanks for this comment. Too many people just want shit nerfed or taken out instead of learning how to play against it. Case in point I main top and used to have real trouble against Riven. Now with my champ pool I know how to play against her and usually stomp because I took the time to learn. It's a shame so many people want to take the skill out of the game...
Yes cause quoting my one part that says i have experience, and know i can be fucked in the ass as a Nidalee quite easily is viable to say she's unhealthy.
He doesn't understand reason and logic, it's okay. I'm going to go play a game with nidalee and probably get shat on because i'm one of the squishiest mid laners.

Old Nidalee spears:
55 / 95 / 140 / 185 / 230 (+65% AP). 
Max range 150% bonus:
137 / 237 / 350 / 462 / 575 (+162.5% AP)

Current Nidalee spears:
50 / 75 / 100 / 125 / 150 (+40% AP)
Max range 200% bonus:
150 / 225 / 300 / 375 / 450 (+120% AP)


Now lets take these numbers into a better context, 600 AP, current and old at different ranges (all max level'd spears).

Point blank;
Old: 620
New: 390
Difference: 230

Half range;
Old (75% bonus): 1085
New (100% bonus): 780
Difference: 205

Max range;
Old (150% bonus): 1550
New (200% bonus):  1170
Difference: 380

So in other words, New nidalee only has a close damage range about the Half way mark, and in fact loses a ton more for each extra point of AP she has (42.5% AP scaling lost, and base damage loss)

So now if your being sieged and take a spear, you will survive it most times, and be able to back off, old nidalee would kill you flat out (which is why she was changed).

Not to mention her early game is extremely hard to play in lane (she is squishy and most mid's actually beat her unless they are tanking spear the entire laning phase)
I did the maths for this a few weeks ago. The spear damage of Old Nidalee is only about 300 more than Current Nidalee.

I was wondering this as well, I stopped playing LoL for a 16 months after failing my gold V placements 6 times in a row during the cancercat freelo era just before she got gutted, come back and she seems stronger than ever and is also now viable in another role, plus her new cougar form kit is less buggy than the old one making her easier to play, someone at riot must main her lmao.
Nah Riot needs to leave their resident op cancer bomb for another few months and then they'll finally do something about it
